There were no other sightings in Vista on or around February 26th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was getting ready to leave my friends house at 1:15 am, my two friends and i decided to go outside and have a cigarette before i left. after about 15 seconds of standing there, she asked what that glowing, flickering light in the sky was. pointing above the mountain horizon, i saw what appeared to be a yellow\orange\white light glowing sporadically in the sky. i pulled my cell phone from my pocket and filmed it as steady as i could. we first argued that maybe it was a car pointing its light on the horizon directly at us, but then we realized that they would have to be very strong lights. we also talked that maybe it was a fire, however, that was disbanded because fires tend to glow softly from that distance. no, this was definitely above the mountain horizon. after about 2 minutes or so, my friends asked what the other light in the sky was. however, looking only at the original, i had no idea there was a brighter, bluish-white, much more active glowing one to it's left. i recorded both close together in the second video. i had to leave and quit filming because it was late. when i got home, my step-father saw the video and recommended to be placed here.
